title.narrative: Emergency assistance in restoring food security and agricultural production in Typhoon Koppu affected communities

description.narrative:
The project will respond to the urgent needs of farmers in Region III (Nueva Ecija, Pampanga and Tarlac provinces) who were affected by Typhoon Koppu and drought due to El Niño as prioritized by the Government. FAO will provide certified rice seeds and fertilizers to some 13,000 farm households or 65,000 individuals in order for them to restore their agriculture-based livelihoods. The project recognizes the importance of not only providing food assistance but also in supporting food producers and getting food production in the target priority areas back and running as soon as possible.
Total project budget: $4,800,000 Total funds received to date: $556,796 Amount requested from CERF:$1,111,305
